subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The day after Rex Ryan said that Derrick Mason remained an important part of the Jets’ offensive revival, the team sent him to the Texans for a conditional draft pick.
snippet: The day after Rex Ryan said that Derrick Mason remained an important part of the Jets’ offensive revival, the team sent him to the Texans for a conditional draft pick.
